UniprotID	Q16769
Accession	Q16769;Q16770;Q3KRG6;Q53TR4
EntryName	QPCT_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glutaminyl-peptide cyclotransferase (EC 2.3.2.5) (Glutaminyl cyclase) (QC) (sQC) (Glutaminyl-tRNA cyclotransferase) (Glutamyl cyclase) (EC)
GeneName	QPCT
Length	361
Function	Responsible for the biosynthesis of pyroglutamyl peptides. Has a bias against acidic and tryptophan residues adjacent to the N-terminal glutaminyl residue and a lack of importance of chain length after the second residue. Also catalyzes N-terminal pyroglutamate formation. In vitro, catalyzes pyroglutamate formation of N-terminally truncated form of APP amyloid-beta peptides -amyloid-beta. May be involved in the N-terminal pyroglutamate formation of several amyloid-related plaque-forming peptides.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
Disorder	0.4119,0.4582,0.3392,0.3774,0.2849,0.2094,0.1476,0.1048,0.0851,0.0888,0.0929,0.0690,0.0967,0.0443,0.0356,0.0356,0.0349,0.0356,0.0244,0.0356,0.0662,0.0631,0.0494,0.0851,0.0690,0.0568,0.1115,0.1852,0.2817,0.3494,0.3910,0.3215,0.4119,0.3910,0.5456,0.5456,0.4507,0.3631,0.3740,0.4409,0.4369,0.3807,0.2988,0.3249,0.3392,0.2752,0.3631,0.3460,0.3321,0.3215,0.3149,0.2094,0.3019,0.3117,0.2609,0.1373,0.1702,0.2645,0.3631,0.2609,0.2752,0.3053,0.2470,0.2470,0.1611,0.1671,0.2541,0.1881,0.2002,0.1969,0.1881,0.2164,0.3087,0.3087,0.1969,0.2094,0.2884,0.2783,0.2783,0.2680,0.2609,0.2094,0.1969,0.2849,0.2752,0.3774,0.3599,0.2715,0.3807,0.3215,0.3321,0.2224,0.1424,0.0851,0.0967,0.0985,0.1251,0.1501,0.0749,0.0398,0.0380,0.0734,0.0967,0.1070,0.0581,0.1048,0.0531,0.0531,0.0888,0.0398,0.0473,0.0473,0.0568,0.0494,0.0835,0.0780,0.0835,0.0851,0.0967,0.1881,0.2436,0.2503,0.2399,0.2364,0.1399,0.1702,0.1092,0.1583,0.1070,0.1115,0.1251,0.1373,0.1251,0.1942,0.1881,0.1048,0.1007,0.1583,0.0749,0.0690,0.0734,0.0870,0.0581,0.0281,0.0194,0.0313,0.0380,0.0646,0.0835,0.1275,0.1048,0.1229,0.1349,0.0888,0.0734,0.1028,0.1528,0.0967,0.1070,0.1298,0.1007,0.0929,0.0765,0.0676,0.1399,0.1942,0.1942,0.1476,0.0888,0.0799,0.0473,0.0592,0.0929,0.0494,0.0765,0.0985,0.1206,0.1528,0.2609,0.2503,0.2503,0.2752,0.1914,0.2328,0.2328,0.1449,0.0704,0.0320,0.0592,0.1007,0.1137,0.1969,0.1671,0.0835,0.0749,0.0765,0.0334,0.0334,0.0398,0.0364,0.0364,0.0618,0.0372,0.0349,0.0320,0.0531,0.0948,0.1823,0.2129,0.1791,0.1501,0.1373,0.0967,0.0985,0.1852,0.2715,0.3019,0.4186,0.4541,0.4541,0.4409,0.4017,0.4051,0.4979,0.6269,0.6183,0.6531,0.5419,0.5382,0.6576,0.6427,0.6991,0.5854,0.5382,0.4979,0.4149,0.3286,0.3117,0.2328,0.1323,0.1162,0.0967,0.1373,0.1501,0.1731,0.1731,0.0929,0.1007,0.1702,0.0909,0.0405,0.0662,0.0676,0.1092,0.1449,0.1969,0.1583,0.1298,0.1349,0.2002,0.2034,0.2164,0.2164,0.1137,0.1162,0.0948,0.1028,0.1229,0.1007,0.1028,0.1251,0.2328,0.1323,0.0734,0.0734,0.0967,0.0948,0.1852,0.2164,0.2164,0.2224,0.3053,0.1942,0.1206,0.2
